metadata.title: CVE-2013-7469 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Seafile through 6.2.11 always uses the same Initialization Vector (IV) with Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) Mode to encrypt private data, making it easier to conduct chosen-plaintext attacks or dictionary attacks.

criterions.comment: seafile package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
